WorkItem.ClosedComment: Is this the entirety of your project? Note that a triple slash reference to jquery.d.ts merely provides type information to your program. It does not load jquery.js either in a script tag or via any module loading system. So it makes perfect sense that you would see a runtime error here (although the particular message you're seeing is somewhat surprising). You will need to make sure jquery.js is actually loaded somehow, in any of the traditional ways you would do in javascript.
